text: U di gava ji bona wan ra hatiye gotine: “Hun bibine peyrewe wan biryarne ku Yezdan hinartine.” Ewan gotine: “Na, em nabine peyrewe wan, le ewan tistne, ku bav u kale me hogiri daye wan eme hey bibne peyrewe wan. Ere! Le heke bav u kale wan qe hise wan negi-hije tu tisti u di reya rast da nebin ji, ewane disa bibine peyrewe hogiriya wan
